程序包 <Unnamed>

The javax.resource package is the top-level package for the Java EE Connector API specification.

请参阅: 说明

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AddToCartController
    Class AddToCartController contains the servlet controller functionality for processing customer's request to add a Product into the cart.
    CategorizeController
    Class CategorizeController contains the servlet controller functionality for processing customer's request to show the Products of a particular category.
    CustomerLoginController
    Class CustomerLoginController contains the servlet controller functionality for processing customer's request to log in to the store.
    CustomerLogoutController
    Class CustomerLogoutController contains the servlet controller functionality for processing customer's request to log out.
    CustomerOrderHistoryController
    Class CustomerOrderHistoryController contains the servlet controller functionality for processing customer's request to view order history.
    CustomerSignupController
    Class CustomerSignupController contains the servlet controller functionality for processing customer's request to sign up.
    DecreaseQuantityController
    Class DecreaseQuantityController contains the servlet controller functionality for processing customer's request to decrease the number of Products of a title in the cart
    DeleteProductFromCartController
    Class DeleteProductFromCartController contains the servlet controller functionality for processing customer's request to delete Product from the cart
    IncreaseQuantityController
    Class IncreaseQuantityController contains the servlet controller functionality for processing customer's request to increase the number of Products of a title in the cart
    OrderController
    Class OrderController contains the servlet controller functionality for processing customer's request to make an order.
    ProductDetailsController
    Class ProductDetailsController contains the servlet controller functionality for processing customer's request to see the details about a Product.
    SearchController
    Class SearchController contains the servlet controller functionality for processing customer's request to search a Product by title or author.

程序包的说明

The javax.resource package is the top-level package for the Java EE Connector API specification.
